wishmitha dasabala ( karapincha nishpadana) - dab. em. em. malan dabarera mahatha, wishramika ranawiru saksas flawars (wisithuru mal pala ha kabanika pohora) - dab. en.es. pranandu mahatha, wishramika ranawiru si.pi.ke. ookids - kusumsiri liyanage mahatha, wishramika ranawiru wisithuru malpala thawana - ee.ji.es. jayathilaka mahatha, wishramika ranawiru elawalu ha palathuru pala nishpadanaya ha alewiya - el.dab.dab.es.ke. siriwardhana mahatha, wishramika ranawiru mimasi palanaya ha aashritha nishpadana ha alewiya - thissa bandara mahatha shri lanka yudha hamuda krushikarma ha pashu sampath adhyaksha mandalaya shri lanka guwan hamuda widhayaka eekakaya siwil aarakshaka departhamenthuwa mehidi atham ranawiru krushi nishpadana sandaha deshiya hotal sandaha awashya nishpadana sapayimata awasthawan uda kara ganimata hakiwimath, wideshiya welandama sandaha awasthawan laba ganime mulika pasubima sakas kara ganimata hakiwima da jayagrahanayaki.

nithimaya prashna dekakata yatathwa me pethsama wibhaga kirimata awasara dun shreshtadhikaranaya pethsam wibhagaya mayi masa 29 wanida arambaimata thiranaya keleya.pethsama sambandha likhitha deshana sathi hatharakadi idiripath karana lesa pethsamkara saha wagauththarakara deparshawayata niyama karana ladi.nithipathiwaraya wisin gonu kala me pethsama salim marsup, priyasath dep, eewa wanasundara yana shreshtadhikarana winisuru mandulla idiriyehi kandawana ladi.mehidi pethsama wenuwen nithipathi palitha pranandu mahatha adhikaranayata karunu idiripath kara sitimin sandahan kele parlimenthuwata ho ehi kotasakwana therim karaka sabhawata ho rit aagnya nikuth kirime balayak abhiyachanadhikaranayata nomathi bawaya.janathawage adhikarana balaya parlimenthuwa mangin adhikaranaya haraha kriyathmaka karana bawa nithipathiwaraya mehidi sandahan kaleya.

badulla, kappetipola mawathe pihiti niwasaka pipirimak samanga athiwu gini ganimakin kanthawak miyagos thibenawa.ada (10) perawaruwe athiwu mema siduwimen miyagos aththe 42 hawiridi thidaru mawak bawayi apa warthakaru pawasuwe.siddhiya siduwana awasthawe adala kanthawa pamanak niwase randi sita athi athara ayage pilissunu sirura niwase muluthange thibi soyagena thibenawa.mema niwase thibi petral bothal kihipayak da soya ganimata hakiwu bawayi apa warthakaru wadiduratath sandahan kale.
